channel.title: Simulators on Game Rift
channel.description: Recent content in Simulators on Game Rift

item.title: PayDay 2
item.description: Game Description Re-join the PayDay 2 gang as Dallas, Hoxton, Chains or Wolfe, who have come to Washington to rob and make a lot of money. Put the mask on your favorite hero and set off to carry out your next crime, in which you will need to overcome many obstacles before reaching your goal. Now you will have a wide variety of contracts to choose from, from which you can choose any one.

item.title: A Merchant's Promise
item.description: Game Description ** A Merchant’s Promise ** Places the player in the stylized Middle Ages, concentrated on commerce and transportation through direct physical handling of objects. The path begins with the role of a worthless merchant, who is instructed to manually move goods using a system based on physics. There is no usual inventory here; Each object needs to be raised, carried and placed, which creates a constant risk of dropping or even throwing a luggage.

item.title: Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth
item.description: Game Description ** Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth ** abandoned long walks and romantic novels with stars that are found in other farm sigas. It’s enough just to click a cursor. The Title with a strategic farm bias with your head immerses you in the creation, construction, collection and management of a prosperous farm. Starting from a modest site, do not allow the initial sizes to deceive you. Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth is all about potential.

item.title: Contraband Police
item.description: Game Description ** Contraband Police ** - The simulator of the border guard in the first person. The player in the role of the commander of the border post makes an inspection of transport for the presence of smuggling on the border of the third world countries. ** The inspection tasks include: ** checking documents: inspection and permit for entry criminals … or take a bribe. What? Nobody heard this! To carry out reports on the successful completion of tasks through the mail; the accumulated experience can be spent on pumping the department, buying new equipment or training dogs;

item.title: Doloc Town
item.description: Game Description ** Doloc Town ** - this is a farm simulator in the conditions of post -apocalypse. The player accepts the role of a beginner whose task is to build an existing economy in the desert territory. The environment pushes to the study of its predominantly unexplored areas. Key activity includes the landing of cultures, the construction of the necessary structures and the consistent search for information about the past of this changed world.

item.title: Drive Beyond Horizons
item.description: Game Description ** Drive Beond Horizons ** Refuses the line path and throws gamers into a huge, constantly changing world. Fasten the belts and get ready for the study - the procedurally generated landscapes make each game unique. Leave the comfort zone and choose your own route. Travel through spacious deserts, lush forests, on any roads (or their absence). But this is not just an excursion trip. Drive Beond Horizons is fraught with many secrets and difficulties that have to be solved.

item.title: E-Startup 2: Business Tycoon
item.description: Game Description ** E-Startup 2: Business Tycoon ** throws you headlong into the world of product management. Development, production, sale - all this is on your conscience. Fasten the belts because you will also have to juggle with resources, monitor the constantly changing market and make sure that your office does not turn into a productivity cemetery. Do you think you have the next big thing? Title will allow you to bring your concept from a sketch on a napkin to a store shelf.

item.title: IDUN
item.description: Game Description ** Idun ** throws you into a hostile world, teeming with resources and teeming with enemies. This is a genre mixing in which in real time the strategy is combined with the protection of the tower, which gives a unique experience. Your mission? To capture all the most valuable and get out alive. But this is not a light walk. Enemy hordes are teeming on the battlefield, tirelessly pursuing your base.

item.title: Learning Factory
item.description: Game Description ** learning factory ** - a simulator that is designed to create an automated process of processes and, most importantly, understand one simple truth: what do cats want? The gameplay allows you to head the Kotovod factory. It was once closed, but now it has been possible to renew the process and create your own cat store. Learning factory gameplay largely gives an idea of ​​how machine learning works.

item.title: Let's Build a Zoo
item.description: Game Description ** Let’s Build a Zoo ** - A bright sandbox with a simulator elements, which provides players with the opportunity to build their own zoo. It is required to install enclosures, buy rare animals, hire employees for service and much more. It is allowed to cross animal DNA, producing more than 300,000 unique rocks into the world. In order for the reserve to function, it will be necessary to hire veterinarians, trainers, cleaners, repairmen and other performers who support their lives in the zoo.

item.title: On the Western Front
item.description: Game Description ** On the Western Front ** - this is a tactical strategy, the action of which unfolds against the background of the First World War, namely on the infamous Western Front. Users take on the role of the division commander, who are instructed to manage various aspects of military operations in one of the most exhausting and complex periods in history. The Title emphasizes the harsh realities of the trench war, where the soldiers are faced with many problems, from the constant threat of enemy fire to the constant need to manage resources.

item.title: Pinball Spire
item.description: Game Description ** Pinball Spire ** challenges the world, combining the classic pinball mechanics with elements of research and development for a unique adventure. You take control of a pee, a brave character, whose determination plays a key role - both in the plot and in how you play. The essence of Pinball Spire is to manage a mysterious spire that suddenly appeared in the world of a pipa. This is not an ordinary pinball table.

item.title: Pumping Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description ** Pumping Simulator 2 ** sends you on a trip to the world of management of gas stations. Start your entrepreneurial adventure by the sale of a classic car to get the funds necessary for the reconstruction of an abandoned gas station in a busy city. Your goal is to turn an abandoned station into a prosperous center for local residents and travelers. From the very beginning, you will build, expand and modernize your gas station.

item.title: Rise of the White Sun
item.description: Game Description ** Rise of the White Sun ** transfers to the chaos of China of the 1920s, the period of riots and fragmented leadership. In this grandiose strategic game, you have to pave the way through a fragmented nation controlled by military leaders, rebels and political groups. The action unfolds at a time when various groups dispute control of vast territories and armies, each of which has its own goals, objectives and motives.

item.title: Salvus: Aries
item.description: Game Description ** Salvus: aries ** throws you headlong into the afterlife. Here death is not the end, but a new beginning, although gloomy. You wake up a nameless soul in purgatory, and Rubilovo is just a memory. It turns out that your past life was not entirely sunny and rainbow, and now you are serving a sentence as a reap. You must collect souls until your debt to the universe is paid.

item.title: Schedule I
item.description: Game Description ** Schedule 1 ** puts a gamer in the place of a small drug dealer trying to build a criminal empire from scratch. The action takes place in the gloomy city of Highland Point, and users get the opportunity to expand the scale of their activities, controlling everyone - from production to sales. You will begin with an empty wallet and the necessary connections, gradually rising to control over the criminal world.

item.title: Synergy
item.description: Game Description ** synergy ** dedicated to survival on a hostile planet. In this urban planning strategy, players have to develop their city, face natural cataclysms and make the right decisions that will certainly have consequences. Explore this constantly changing world, preserving the happiness of the townspeople in extreme weather conditions. Gamers will control the weather, seasons, extreme conditions and natural disasters. The main goal is to build a city where residents will be happy and satisfied, respecting the natural needs of the inhabitants and living in harmony with the local fauna and flora.

item.title: Tank Squad
item.description: Game Description ** Tank Squad ** transfers players during the Second World War, to the most intense territories, whose fate will affect the outcome of the clash. The user will visit the role of captain of the tank detachment, taking part in the iconic battles of that time. Scenarios will include historical battles for a single -user or cooperative passage of three participants at the same time. In the multiplayer, each gamer is able to control their own team, or unite among themselves and become a separate crew member.

item.title: Tinkerlands
item.description: Game Description ** Tinkerlands ** offers game experience where the characters find themselves in unknown islands. Survival becomes the main task that encourages the study of these new territories, the creation of the necessary tools and contacts with various inhabitants of these lands. Gamers gradually build personal shelters that can develop into large settlements. Interaction with the environment also opens access to magic, giving additional ways to overcome difficulties. The Tinkerlands universe consists of the main continent, three other large islands and many small islands, each of them provides unique conditions, resources and tests.

item.title: Tiny Life
item.description: Game Description The developers ** Tiny Life ** were inspired by The Sims series, trying to transfer the gameplay to their own project. The gameplay presents pixel graphics and the vast capabilities of the simulator of the life of controlled characters. Before the start of the passage, the player can choose a certain group of people, one ward or use the function of creating. In Tiny Life, the user will have to control all aspects of the life of a group of people living together in the same house.

item.title: Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description ** Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2 ** - fishing simulator, offering to participate in a huge number of tests and demonstrate many different techniques. Use a wide set of tools and gear: feeder, overlap, spinning, classic float and much more. Continuation of the game significantly improves the graphic component, adds many mechanics, tools and improves all aspects of the gameplay. More and better - the basic principle of Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2.

item.title: Wrestling Empire
item.description: Game Description In ** Wrestling Empire ** the player becomes a participant in the World Lightweight Championship. It is necessary to manage an athlete in the ring, apply his abilities and win rivals. The battles are presented in real time with extensive visual effects. This part includes a smooth frequency of personnel and modern graphics, while leaving the atmosphere of retro-style. This version has more functions and capabilities in pumping and battles.

item.title: WTC: Relentless Protagonist [sxs]
item.description: Game Description ** WTC: Relentless Protagonist [sxs] ** - this is a visual short story with two -dimensional graphics. She imitates anime drawing. The atmosphere combines drama, comedy and thriller. There are scenes with violence in the game. Title includes 102 scenes, and his script consists of 73,000 words. The plot has 3 endings and 2 epilogue. The video game is designed for about 6-8 hours of passage. The gameplay traditionally for the genre consists of considering pictures, reading the text and periodic decision -making.
